constraints.name: max_min_diff_leq_d
constraints.description: 最大化最小化差值约束，即最大化所有对的总和中的最小值与最大值之差不超过某个值
constraints.formal: minimize (max(S) - min(S)) where S = {a_{2i-1} + a_{2i} | 1 ≤ i ≤ n}

constraints.name: pairwise_swap
constraints.description: 允许对称位置的元素进行交换操作
constraints.formal: swap(a_i, a_{i+n}) for any 1 ≤ i ≤ n
